entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
